product_name: The North Face Glacier Quarter-Zip Top - Women's
long_description: The North Face Glacier Quarter-Zip top for women provides warmth and breathability without weight and bulk. Wear it for hiking, climbing or running around town in cool weather. Quick-drying, moisture-wicking Polartec(R) Classic 100 Micro fleece keeps you warm and feels ultra-soft; features natural stretch and resists pilling. 1 in. droptail hem; feminine silhouette. The North Face Glacier Quarter-Zip top features a classic fit.
short_description: The North Face Glacier Quarter-Zip top for women provides warmth and breathability without weight and bulk. Wear it for hiking, climbing or running around town in cool weather.
